title: I’m Sick And Tired Of Being Sick And Tired
itunes:title: I’m Sick And Tired Of Being Sick And Tired
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been with my boyfriend for 5 years. He’s 30 years old and I’m 28. Since the pandemic hit, he’s been drinking a lot. At first it was out of boredom to pass the time and I didn’t mind it because it was just beer. Now he’s drinking at least 30 beers a week and our recycling bin stays full of beer cans each week. He’s swapped out his coffee and bagel for a beer before he heads to work.....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been with my boyfriend for 5 years. He’s 30 years old and I’m 28. Since the pandemic hit, he’s been drinking a lot. At first it was out of boredom to pass the time and I didn’t mind it because it was just beer. Now he’s drinking at least 30 beers a week and our recycling bin stays full of beer cans each week. He’s swapped out his coffee and bagel for a beer before he heads to work.....................
